# pyspark_dubber.sql.functions.split

```python
pyspark_dubber.sql.functions.split(
	str: pyspark_dubber.sql.expr.Expr | str,
	pattern: pyspark_dubber.sql.expr.Expr | str,
	limit: pyspark_dubber.sql.expr.Expr | str | int = -1,
)
```

[PySpark API Reference](https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/reference/pyspark.sql/api/pyspark.sql.functions.split.html)

!!! warning "Incompatibility Note"

    The `limit` argument is not honored.
